title: Remove unnecessary components from ui/shared/status
body:
The task is created to remove the components that either 
1. shouldn't be under this folder like the modals
2. Remove them if they already exist on StatusQ, update their usage in desktop 
3. Create tasks for bigger components that need to be placed under StatusQ instead

Tasks:

- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3831
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3832
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3846
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3845
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3848
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3882
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3896
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3897
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3898
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/3919
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/3920
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/3922


**Create new corresponding StatusQ Component**
- StatusCategoryButton.qml
- StatusChatCommandButton.qml
- StatusNotification.qml
- StatusStickerButton.qml
- StatusChatImageLoader.qml + StatusChatImage.qml -> make single component for users
- StatusChatImageExtensionValidator.qml + StatusChatImageQtyValidator.qml + StatusChatImageSizeValidator.qml + StatusChatImageValidator.qml -> Create reusable error box that can be updated with correct values? Maybe the different validators can remain as 3 separate ones and inherit from the StatusQComponent. I really wonâ€™t be needed as these components will only have 2-3 values to be updated.
- StatusRadioButtonRow.qml
- StatusSettingsLineButton.qml - used in multiple places can create a tow with text, options to support different types in StatusQ
- StatusChatInputImageArea.qml - can be used as a component in StatusChatInput Component which should also move to StatusQ?
- StatusTextFormatMenu.qml - can be a reusable component easily
- StatusWalletColorButton.qml + StatusWalletColorSelect.qml -> Can be combined and exposed as one component from StatusQ where icons model can be added as pleases the consumer
- StatusChatInput.qml: a Generic chat input component can be exposed and additionally it can be modified in the corresponding components in ui/shared/status

**move to ui/shared/popups ???**
- StatusChatCommandsPopup.qml
- StatusGifPopup.qml	
- StatusEmojiPopup.qml
- StatusEmojiSuggestionPopup.qml
- StatusInputListPopup.qml
- StatusStickerPackClickPopup.qml
- StatusStickersPopup.qml
- StatusETHTransactionModal.qml
- StatusImageModal.qml
- StatusSNTTransactionModal.qml

**Needs Brainstorming on how to make more modular of smaller components that may reside in StatusQ**
- StatusChatInput.qml
  StatusChatInputReplyArea.qml
  StatusChatInputTextFormationAction.qml
- StatusStickerList.qml
  StatusStickerMarket.qml
  StatusStickerPackDetails.qml
  StatusStickerPackIconWithIndicator.qml
  StatusSticker.qml

**Stays as it is -**
- StatusImageRadioButton.qml
- StatusSectionHeadline.qml
- StatusSectionDescItem.qml (only used in profile as of now)
- StatusContextMenuButton.qml
- StatusExpandableAddress.qml
- StatusEmojiSection.qml
- StatusGifColumn.qml
